entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
